system.description:
Effect: The targeted Pokémon spends 10 PP and undergoes Mega Evolution.

May only be used by either a Pokémon holding a matched Mega Stone or its partner, holding a Key Stone. The Pokémon may use this with target Self if the partner is within 50m.

actions.name: Mega Evolve!
